label: 後三房
対訳語: the later three fusa"	Go-Daigo's "new men," his "men of talent."  Yoshida Sadafusa, Madenokōji Nobufusa, and Kitabatake Chikafusa, all three good Confucian ministers who maintained a lifelong loyalty to their sovereign, remonstrated when necessary, proffered sound advice, and represented him in delicate dealings with the bakufu (p. 30).  [後醍醐、吉田定房、万里小路宣房、北畠親房] [HW]"
